response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, matching perfectly with your needs and aspirations. I understand its worth to you is $800,000, which aligns perfectly with my asking price. I am offering you the chance to secure this masterpiece at the same value, $800,000, to ensure you receive it without any compromise on quality or integrity. I trust that you will appreciate the care and craftsmanship that has gone into this product, making it not just an investment but a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 800000}
